01618f10-2728-11ee-857d-c1cfd0e9188a.description:
The natural rhythm of our skin involves a 28-day cycle of cell regeneration and exfoliation. If this process is hindered by dead skin cells clogging our pores, it can lead to inflammation and dull skin tone.

With this in mind, we've formulated a gentle, lightweight toner to help sweep away residual dead skin cells and sebum that may linger post-cleansing.

At the heart of our toner is the power of plum, a long-standing herbal remedy, now harnessed for its cosmetic benefits in skin texture care and dead cell removal. Working in harmony with mung bean extract‚Äîa skin-soothing powerhouse‚Äîand the chemical exfoliants AHA and BHA, this toner is all set to revitalize your skin's natural glow.

Daily Exfoliating Toner
Green Plum Toner is ideal for use in the morning and evening during the first step of skin care to wipe away residual waste and smooth out the skin texture. After sufficiently moistening a cotton pad with toner, gently wipe the skin from the inside to the outside. It not only cleans up waste but also enhances the skin condition to facilitate better absorption of follow-up skin care products.

Key ingredients

Green plum water 25% + Mung bean extract 2%
Donguibogam, an herbal medicine book from the Joseon Dynasty, states that plums lower the temperature, ease the mind, and help stop thirst and diarrhea. In Korean history, plum and mung bean were used as medicines to treat stomachaches or rid the body of toxins.
Plum water and mung bean extract as skin care ingredients help to smooth out skin texture and provide moisture.

AHA + BHA
With a mixture of 2% glycolic acid and 0.5% salicylic acid, you can use it every morning and evening to remove dead skin cells without irritating your skin. It is made with a mild formula that combines a low concentration of chemical exfoliants and plant extracts rather than attempting to create powerful effects via overly high concentrations of AHA and BHA since cosmetics are not categorized as drugs. This is because we believe that it is important to constantly monitor and care for the condition of the skin without causing irritation.
01618f10-2728-11ee-857d-c1cfd0e9188a.name: [BEAUTY OF JOSEON] Green Plum Refreshing Toner : AHA + BHA

04b0d810-dcf9-11ee-88c0-e151294265d9.name: [ BEAUTY OF JOSEON ] Radiance Cleansing Balm

0d103380-b317-11ef-8324-2b404a488e7c.description:
Tea Tree + 69% Centella Asiatica
If you're oily and acne-prone, then you might already know that Tea Tree and Centella Asiatica are your go-to natural anti-acne busters. So why not complete your arsenal with a refreshing and non-drying foaming cleanser?

Low pH + Sulfate Free
You have sensitive skin but sensitive cleansers are too light; you have acneic skin but acne cleansers are too strong... well, here's an in-between with a low pH to keep your acid mantle protected, with zero sulfates to make sure your skin doesn't feel dry, and a foaming finish to make sure your skin is clean.
0d103380-b317-11ef-8324-2b404a488e7c.howToUse:
Apply a few pumps onto the hands and create a lather
Gently massage it to onto the face for 60 seconds
Rinse and follow with the rest of your routine starting with toner

Centella Calming Gel Cream:

A refreshing and moisturizing oil-free cream that makes the skin clearer and more vibrant.
Enriched with Centella Asiatica Leaf Water 70% and Tea tree Leaf Water 10%, gently lowers skin's temperature, effectively soothes and calms sensitive skin with blemishes.
Lightweight gel texture containing 6 kinds of sprout extracts fully moisturizes skin and helps relieve skin stress, creating clear, refreshed skin in a good condition.

After applying toner, gently apply a moderate amount on facial area. Pat from the inner to outer skin texture for better absorption.

Contains 67% Tea Tree Extract and 19.5% Centella Extract which help soothe sensitive skin, and alleviate skin traces for clear and clean skin tone.
Replenishes your skin with deep moisturizing effect and strengthens the skin barrier of dry skin.
Provides abundant moisture and nutrition to restore smooth, supple skin.
Centella Calming Daily Sunscreen 

This is a mild daily sunscreen that can gently protect your skin from UV rays.
Formulated with a UV protecting power of SPF 50, PA++++.
Contains Centella Extract, which helps to sooth your skin under the heat and exposure to sunlight.
A lightweight, watery texture that won't leave any white casts.

Tea Tree Relief Serum 15ml
- After facial cleansing and toner, apply a proper amount to your face and gently dab for absorption.
Centella Calming Gel Cream 60ml

Centella Calming Daily Sunscreen 15ml
- Apply an appropriate amount evenly over skin. Reapply as required throughout the day.

23aebeb0-36b1-11ee-abca-770664651595.description:
What it is
This serum is designed for individuals dealing with pigmentation issues and uneven skin complexion. Infused with 68% rice bran water and 2% alpha arbutin, it works diligently to illuminate and boost the health of your skin.


Key ingredients

Rice bran water 68%
Rice has played a very important role as a staple food and skin care ingredient in Korean history.
In the Joseon Dynasty, rice bran water was used like the toner of today, and was called Beauty Water, used for beautiful skin. Rice bran is rich in amino acids and minerals, helping to moisturize dry skin.

Alpha-Arbutin 2%
Alpha-Arbutin works by inhibiting the tyrosinase activity that limits the melanin production in your skin. It is also known to have a 10 times greater effect than regular Beta-Arbutin.

How to use
Apply 2-3 drops of serum onto the face. Pat gently to aid absorption.
23aebeb0-36b1-11ee-abca-770664651595.howToUse:
How to use
Apply 2-3 drops of serum onto the face. Pat gently to aid absorption.

As the last step of skincare, take an appropriate amount and pat in to the skin for better absorption.

The iUNIK Tea Tree Relief Serum is a calming serum formulated for dehydrated and sensitive skin. Made with 67% of tea tree leaf water known for its anti-inflammatory and antimicrobial benefits and ability to cure troubled skin, and 19.7% of the centella asiatica extract to soothe redness or irritated skin. niacinamide, and adenosine are present to boost the brightening and antiwrinkle effects.

﻿Recommended for: ﻿Combination, oily, sensitive skin types.
28f8d440-b1a9-11ef-911c-25022dad7c1d.howToUse:
After cleansing and toning your face, dispense an appropriate amount of the Tea Tree Relief Serum.
Gently apply the serum onto your face, focusing on areas prone to breakouts or redness.
Pat the serum into your skin until fully absorbed. Follow up with your moisturizer or sunscreen as needed.

2eb51690-0418-11ee-b0e6-07fee6ac47ba.description:
What it is
Matte Sun Stick was developed with Ram√≥n @glowbyramon, an influencer and cosmetic chemist, as the director. It was created after an extensive collaboration by meticulously going through all the processes that fall under BOJ's brand philosophy of Modern Hanbang skin care.

Most sun sticks are focused on use for outdoor activities, but we wanted to bring out the usefulness of sun sticks in our daily lives in bustling cities as well. To get listed SPF and PA protection level, sunscreen should be reapplied every 2-3 hours, but that‚Äôs not easy to do all of the time. So, we developed a sun stick with a matte formula that doesn't get clumpy and doesn't feel sticky or greasy even when reapplied several times over makeup.

Sebum-control silica powder regulates sebum to increase adherence and provides a matte and smooth finish without clumping. Containing artemisia capillaris and green tea extracts, it helps create smooth skin while maintaining moisture.

Non-greasy matte sun stick
It is a matte sun stick without any of the oily or sticky feelings. It is hygienic as you don‚Äôt need to apply it with your hands, and it is compact, enabling convenient use anytime, anywhere.

Porous sebum-control silica powder
Sebum-control silica powder regulates sebum on the skin, giving a smooth and soft-rolling feeling without greasiness.

Key ingredients
Artemisia Capillaris
Mugwort has been an important ingredient throughout the history of oriental medicine. And artemisia capillaris has a cooling property and has been used as a therapeutic medicine to lower body temperature since ancient times. It contains vitamins A and C as well as various minerals to help nourish and soothe the skin.

 

SPF & PA Protection
SPF and PA tests were completed in labs in both Korea and Spain, and the results are as follows.

[SPF]
Korean Lab : 55.8¬±7.8
Spain Lab: 61¬±6.6

[PA]
Korean Lab : UVA PF 18.5¬±3.0 P++++
Spain Lab: UVA PF 29.1¬±6.7 P++++
2eb51690-0418-11ee-b0e6-07fee6ac47ba.howToUse:
How to Use the Beauty of Joseon Matte Sun Stick:

Start Fresh: Ensure your skin is clean and clear. Use the Beauty of Joseon Dynasty Cream or your favorite moisturizer for a hydrated base.
Swipe and Protect: Apply the Matte Sun Stick evenly on your face and neck as the final step in your morning skincare routine. Its compact size is ideal for on-the-go applications, making it a breeze to reapply throughout the day for consistent protection.
Blend for Perfection: Gently pat the product into the skin for full absorption. Enjoy the lightweight texture that leaves a matte finish, eliminating any shine.
Reapply with Ease: For continued protection, especially under the Singapore sun, reapply every two hours or immediately after excessive sweating or swimming. The convenient stick format means no mess and no fuss ‚Äì just swipe and go!
All Skin Types Friendly: Our formula is designed to be inclusive, suitable for all skin types and tones, from oily to dry, and light to dark. It's also makeup-friendly, serving as an excellent primer for a flawless look.
Embrace the Full Experience: Pair with the Beauty of Joseon Dynasty Cream for a complete skincare routine that nurtures and shields your skin, leveraging the potent benefits of Hanbang ingredients.
Remember, consistent use of the Beauty of Joseon Matte Sun Stick not only defends your skin against the sun's rays but also contributes to a healthier, more radiant complexion. Make it an essential part of your daily beauty regimen and step out with confidence, knowing you're protected and empowered by the secrets of traditional Korean beauty.

32396480-2879-11ee-9456-391b02f76f7f.description:
What it is‚Äã
Choosing a cleanser involves finding a balance between thorough cleansing and maintaining the skin's barrier health. Our Green Plum Refreshing Cleanser, with its gentle, slightly acidic formulation, harnesses the power of plant-derived extracts from plum and mung bean seeds to achieve just that.

‚ÄãHypoallergenic, slightly acidic formula
Healthy skin is slightly acidic because of the acidic components secreted by the sweat and sebaceous glands. When these acidic components decrease, the skin's defense weakens, making it easy for the skin to become sensitive. Green Plum Refreshing Cleanser is a slightly acidic cleanser that helps to cleanse the face without damaging the natural skin barrier.

Moist gel formula
It does not dry out the skin and provides a moist feeling even after cleansing.

Natural Hanbang ingredients
Extracts from plum and mung bean, which have long been used as Hanbang ingredients, help give you a refreshing and moisturizing cleansing.

Key ingredients

Plum water 24%

According to Donguibogam, plums are sour and non-toxic, and not only do they reduce fever and relieve heartburn, they also quench thirst and rejuvenate muscles and the pulse. Plums are rich in organic acids and vitamins, and have long been used as an herbal ingredient. 
They soften old dead skin cells and moisturize the skin.

Mung bean seed extract 3%
Mung beans are effective for exfoliating, so they were made into a face cleanser by grinding them together with red beans, other beans, and rice bran in the Joseon Dynasty.
In addition, the saponin contained in mung bean helps to keep the skin moist for a long time by promoting the creation of moisture.
32396480-2879-11ee-9456-391b02f76f7f.howToUse:
Incorporate the Beauty of Joseon Green Plum Refreshing Cleanser into your daily skincare routine for a revitalizing and gentle cleanse:

Morning and Evening: Use the cleanser both in the morning and evening as the first step in your skincare routine.
Wet Your Face: Start by wetting your face with lukewarm water. This helps to prepare your skin for cleansing.
Dispense Cleanser: Squeeze an appropriate amount of the cleanser onto your palms.
Lather and Apply: Gently rub your palms together to create a luxurious lather. Apply the lather to your damp face, avoiding the eye area.
Massage Gently: With gentle, circular motions, massage the cleanser into your skin. Take a moment to enjoy the refreshing sensation.
Rinse Thoroughly: Rinse your face with lukewarm water until all traces of the cleanser are removed. Pat your skin dry with a clean towel.
Follow with Skincare: Continue with your skincare routine, including toners, serums, and moisturizers, to lock in the benefits of the cleanser.
Experience the purity and revitalization of Hanbang-inspired skincare with the Beauty of Joseon Green Plum Refreshing Cleanser. Its hypoallergenic and slightly acidic formula, along with the moist gel texture, ensures a gentle yet effective cleanse, making it suitable for daily use and all skin types. Incorporate this cleanser into your regimen to start and end your day with a refreshing, revitalizing cleanse that sets the stage for a radiant complexion.
32396480-2879-11ee-9456-391b02f76f7f.ingredients:

They soften old dead skin cells and moisturize the skin.

5451eef0-d708-11ee-bd37-1db96dbf1e2f.description:
Pore Refinement ¬∑ Smooth Skin Texture ¬∑ Hydration

Experience a nightly transformation with our Rosemary AHA Night Serum. Enriched with Lactic Acid (9%) for effective exfoliation, Succinic Acid for blackhead reduction, and soothing Rosemary Leaf Extract, this serum unveils smoother, refined skin texture, making makeup application a breeze. Embrace the journey to a flawless, glass-like complexion.
5451eef0-d708-11ee-bd37-1db96dbf1e2f.howToUse: Incorporate our Rosemary AHA Night Serum into your evening routine by first patting your face dry after cleansing. Shake the product for optimal blending, apply evenly, and start with once-a-week usage, gradually increasing to 2-3 times weekly as your skin adjusts. In the morning, cleanse with a gentle cleanser for a radiant, revitalized complexion.

Hyaluronic Acid (45%) + Sea Buckthorn Fruit Extract (5%)
This toner-essence hybrid keeps skin extra hydrated with its unique texture and highly concentrated Hyaluronic Acid. For an extra boost, it's backed with Sea Buckthorn Fruit Extract for a brightening and antioxidant effect.

A Patented Veggie Combo
Called Resmelin H, it's a complex from cedar leaf, prickly ash, and Japanese knotweed (intimidating, yes! super beneficial, also yes!) These extracts provide an antioxidative, anti-inflammatory and brightening effect.

5b10dcb0-7924-11ef-bd03-ffba1d40cc6f.description:
Isntree Chestnut BHA 2% Clear Liquid is a Korean exfoliating toner is infused with 2% BHA (salicylic acid) to effectively slough off dead skin cells, control sebum production, and accelerate skin cell turnover. With additional ingredients like tannin extracted from chestnut shells, it tightens enlarged pores, reduces unwanted shine, and restores the skin's oil-water balance. Hyaluronic acid, sodium hyaluronate, and hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid work together to seal in moisture, keeping your skin hydrated and nourished.
The key benefit of Isntree Chestnut BHA 2% Clear Liquid lies in its exfoliating power. The 2% BHA (salicylic acid) gently removes dead skin cells, unclogs pores, and helps to control excess sebum production. This leads to a smoother, more refined complexion and helps to prevent breakouts. The accelerated skin cell turnover promotes a healthier skin barrier and improves overall skin texture.
5b10dcb0-7924-11ef-bd03-ffba1d40cc6f.howToUse:
After cleansing, soak a cotton pad with the product or dispense directly onto your palm. Apply onto the entire face before patting gently for further absorption.
We recommend doing a patch test on a wrist or behind the ear before using any new product.
5b10dcb0-7924-11ef-bd03-ffba1d40cc6f.ingredients:
Water, Butylene Glycol, Propanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Salicylic Acid, Castanea Crenata (Chestnut) Shell Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Glycerin, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Allantoin
Ingredients are subject to change at the manufacturer's discretion. For the most complete and up-to-date list of ingredients, refer to the product packaging.
5b10dcb0-7924-11ef-bd03-ffba1d40cc6f.name: [ ISNTREE ] Chestnut AHA 8% Clear Essence 100ml

- This groundbreaking age-defying serum with high-strength retinol addresses the visible signs of aging such as wrinkles, large pores and discoloration.

- This retinol-enriched serum dramatically improves the skin resilience, softens lines and wrinkles, minimizes pores and fades the look of discoloration over time.

- The main, functional ingredient, retinol, promotes the synthesis of collagen and accelerates the skin-surface turnover to enhance skin elasticity and improve wrinkles for a more youthful look.

- This retinol-powered formulation instantly brightens and targets dark spots, discoloration and pigmentation to awaken a fresher, more younger look.
5dedf670-968f-11ee-9b7a-191b5ae08934.howToUse:
After cleansing and toning, apply 1 to 2 drops of the product onto the entire face.
Gently pat for an optimal absorption. 

Tips: Mix with 'The Potions Activator' for an enhanced results.
5dedf670-968f-11ee-9b7a-191b5ae08934.ingredients:
Retinol
- Retinol visibly reduces wrinkles and fine lines, firms skin, reduces the look of pores and promotes more even tone and texture.

- Retinol instantly brightens the skin tone by addressing discoloration, dark spots and pigmentation for a youthful look.

- Retinol stimulates cellular turnover and collagen synthesis to combat visible signs of aging for youth-renewing results.

MORE:
Purified water, Propanediol, Pentylene glycol, 1,2-hexanediol, Beta-glucan, Retinol (0.03%), Sodium hyaluronate, Ammonium acryloyldimethyltaurate / Carboxyethyl acrylate crosspolymer, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Lecithin

703f4fa0-36b2-11ee-a510-c78112cb9092.description:
What it is
The loss of protein, which provides elasticity to our skin's dermal layer, leads to a decrease in collagen and hyaluronic acid, resulting in wrinkles. We developed an eye serum designed to mitigate these wrinkles, combining ginseng extract and retinal.

From the outset, ginseng was our chosen base ingredient for this serum, as it's backed by multiple studies for its effectiveness in reducing wrinkles, thanks to its abundant saponin content. Ginseng is a renowned herbal ingredient with exceptional benefits.

We were keen on integrating Vitamin A with ginseng, specifically its two cosmetic forms, retinol and retinal. Our primary challenge was to balance ingredient stability while minimizing skin irritation. Hence, we incorporated 2% (active ingredient 0.02%) of liposome-stabilized retinal in our formula, allowing customers to experience retinal's effects firsthand.

Key ingredients

Ginseng root extract 10%
In Donguibogam, a Korean herbal medicine book, ginseng was used as an important oriental medicine and recorded as 'Shincho', meaning herb from the gods. Hwang Jini, known as the most beautiful woman in the Joseon Dynasty, used a ginseng decoction as a bath water.
The rich saponin in ginseng helps quickly supply moisture to the skin and maintains it deep inside the skin for a long time to help create healthy skin.

Retinal Liposome 2%
Retinal is a vitamin A derivative and has long been used throughout skincare history to improve wrinkles.

When vitamin A is consumed through food, it undergoes metabolic processes that transform it in the order of retinol -> retinal -> retinoic acid. Retinal, which is converted directly to retinoic acid, works faster and more effectively on the skin than retinol, which must go through the process of becoming retinal.

We used a 'retinal liposome' that was stabilized by breaking the retinal into smaller elements and enclosing it in liposomes and then adding ingredients such as natural lipids and oils. In addition, we blend ingredients such as glycerin, niacinamide, and cholesterol together to create a more effective product.
703f4fa0-36b2-11ee-a510-c78112cb9092.howToUse:
How to use
After smoothing out the skin‚Äôs texture with toner, pump the serum 1-2 times and apply it around the eyes or the entire face.

84ec9660-5673-11ef-a9d4-b34aa53f5728.description:
Elevate your skincare ritual with the award-winning Abib Heartleaf Spot Pad Calming Touch, where the power of nature meets the science of gentle care. Immerse your skin in the calming touch of viral K-beauty ingredient heartleaf extract, a botanical marvel that takes your skin on a journey of rejuvenation.

Derived from the heartleaf plant, this extract is a treasure trove of skin-loving benefits. Known for its inherent calming properties, heartleaf extract seamlessly infiltrates the skin's layers, offering relief to even the most sensitive complexion. As each pad sweeps across your face, it carries with it the essence of 40,000ppm of heartleaf extract, infusing your skin with a soothing elixir.

The gauze side delicately engages in a dance of renewal, buffing away dead skin cells with a touch so gentle, it unveils a revitalized radiance beneath. Meanwhile, the plain cotton side, drenched in heartleaf goodness, wipes away impurities, creating a clean canvas for your skincare journey.

Heartleaf extract is a symphony for your skin. It doesn't merely address the surface; it delves deep, calming redness, reducing inflammation, and offering a sanctuary for stressed skin. Its hypoallergenic nature ensures a harmonious experience, making it suitable for your daily skincare routine.

With each use, the Abib Heartleaf Spot Pad Calming Touch becomes your ally in the pursuit of tranquility and clarity. Embrace the transformative touch of nature and let your skin blossom into its most radiant self.
84ec9660-5673-11ef-a9d4-b34aa53f5728.howToUse:
Use after cleansing as both AM/PM skincare regimen. With mild ingredients, Toner Pad may be used every day but please adjust usage to the condition of your skin. Wipe with the embossed side to exfoliate and remove dead skin cells. Gently pat to boost absorption.

We recommend doing a patch test on a wrist or behind the ear before using any new product.

94e03650-36b0-11ee-8869-c7a6888b47b4.description:
What it is
This serum is made for those struggling with enlarged pores and skin inflammation. With a blend of 60% propolis extract and 2% niacinamide, it skillfully manages sebum production while ensuring your skin remains hydrated.

Key ingredients

Propolis extract 60%
There is a record that women in the Joseon Dynasty used honey and grain powder as a wash-off mask pack to care for their skin. As a skincare ingredient, proplis extract is effective for hydrating the skin improving inflammed skin.

Niacinamide 2%
Among the various effects of niacinamide, it is especially helpful in controlling sebum secretion and maintaining the oil and moisture balance of the skin.

BHA 0.5%
As a fat-soluble exfoliant, it helps to remove sebum and wastes accumulated in the pores.

How to use

Apply 2-3 drops of serum onto the face. Pat gently to aid absorption.
94e03650-36b0-11ee-8869-c7a6888b47b4.howToUse: Apply 2-3 drops of serum onto the face. Pat gently to aid absorption.

99dd1240-2652-11ee-a5ca-7ddff72de65c.description:
Elevate your skincare routine with the Beauty of Joseon Red Bean Refreshing Pore Mask. This unique mask features a moist clay texture infused with the goodness of Haenam red bean extract.

Key Features:

Moist Clay Texture: Unlike traditional clay masks, our moist clay texture is gentle on the skin, ensuring a comfortable and non-drying experience. It effectively cleanses pores without over-stripping your skin.
Haenam Red Bean Extract: Enriched with Haenam red bean extract, this mask harnesses the power of natural antioxidants and minerals to purify and revitalize your skin, leaving it feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.
Benefits:

Pore Cleansing: The moist clay formula deeply cleanses and unclogs pores, helping to reduce the appearance of blackheads and excess oil.
Skin Revitalization: Haenam red bean extract promotes skin vitality, enhancing your complexion's radiance and overall health.
Gentle Exfoliation: This mask provides gentle exfoliation, promoting smoother and more refined skin texture without causing irritation.
Suitable for All Skin Types: Formulated to be suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin, it maintains your skin's optimal moisture balance.
Indulge in the purity of nature with Beauty of Joseon Red Bean Refreshing Pore Mask. Incorporate it into your skincare routine to enjoy the refreshing benefits of Haenam red bean extract and the unique moist clay texture. Purify and revitalize your skin, leaving it feeling clean, refreshed, and prepared for your skincare routine.
99dd1240-2652-11ee-a5ca-7ddff72de65c.howToUse: Phaseolus angularis seed extract, glycerin, kaolin, caprylic/capric triglyceride, 1,2-hexanediol, phaseolus angularis seed powder, hectorite, cetyl alcohol, glyceryl stearate se, sorbitan olivate, cetearyl olivate, ultramarines, pyrus communis (pear) fruit extract, ethylhexylglycerin, sodium acrylate/sodium acryloyldimethyl taurate copolymer, hedera helix (ivy) leaf/stem extract, water, polyisobutene, pyrus malus (apple) leaf extract, fragaria chiloensis (strawberry) fruit extract, ci 77491, caprylyl/capryl glucoside, sorbitan oleate, triethoxycaprylylsilane
99dd1240-2652-11ee-a5ca-7ddff72de65c.ingredients:
Rice + Grain complex extracts
Rice has played a very important role as a staple food and skin care ingredient in Korean history.
In the Joseon Dynasty, rice bran water was used like the toner of today, and was called Beauty Water, used for beautiful skin. Rice bran is rich in amino acids and minerals, helping to moisturize dry skin.
99dd1240-2652-11ee-a5ca-7ddff72de65c.name: [BEAUTY OF JOSEON] Red Bean Pore Refreshing Mask

Retinol EX, 1% with Retinol, Retinyl Palmitate, and Bakuchiol, stimulates collagen production and accelerates skin turnover to help reduce the appearance of fine lines.
5 Peptides and 5 Ceramides nurture the skin barrier to improve moisture retention and restore skin elasticity for firmer skin.
TECA soothes irritation and keeps the skin barrier protected from environmental stresses.
Cruelty-free and formulated free of artificial fragrance, drying alcohol or essential oil.

If it is your first time using a Retinol serum, minimize irritation by applying small amounts at a reduced frequency.
Use this Retinol serum after cleansing and toning. 
Apply 2 - 3 drops to the skin and gently pat to allow absorption. 
Recommended usage is once every 3 - 4 days.

a4408330-b1ab-11ef-863e-2900c56abef3.description:
The iUNIK Propolis Vitamin Sleeping Mask is a cream sleeping pack that brightens and soothes while deeply moisturising and nourishing the skin. Enriched with 16% of the propolis extract, 8% of the vitamin tree fruit extract, and 5% of centella asiatica leaf water to intensively supply nutrients and moisture while you sleep. This sleeping mask can also be used as a moisturiser or day cream as it does not have to be washed off. Do not apply it to broken or inflamed skin.

﻿Recommended for: ﻿All skin types.
a4408330-b1ab-11ef-863e-2900c56abef3.howToUse:
Cleanse and tone your face before applying the Propolis Vitamin Sleeping Mask.
Take a moderate amount of the mask and apply it evenly onto your face, avoiding the eye area.
Leave the mask overnight and allow it to deeply nourish and revitalize the skin. Rinse off in the morning with lukewarm water. Use regularly for a hydrated and glowing complexion.

a893fac0-7592-11ef-bb9f-0171f9d451d8.description:
MIRACLE TONER : The Korean toner helps to refine skin texture in the first step of skincare, ensuring a smooth base for makeup application. This AHA BHA toner is particularly effective due to its inclusion of AHA/BHA/PHA ingredients, which gently exfoliate dead skin cells and impurities, leaving the skin clear and smooth. Additionally, the high concentration of tea tree extract in this pore care toner soothes and treats troubled skin, making it an essential part of any Korean skincare routine
KEY INGREDIENTS : AHA exfoliates the surface of the skin and can help to reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and improve the skin texture and tone. BHA exfoliates the inside of the pores, help to clear out impurities and excess sebum. PHA is a gentle exfoliator which help to hydrate the skin, brighten the skin, reduce the appearance of fine lines, and improve the overall texture of the skin
a893fac0-7592-11ef-bb9f-0171f9d451d8.howToUse: After washing your face, saturate a cotton pad with the toner and gently pat it on your face and neck. It can also be applied directly with hands.
a893fac0-7592-11ef-bb9f-0171f9d451d8.ingredients: Water, Butylene Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Extract, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Lens Esculenta (Lentil) Seed Extract, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract, Swiftlet Nest Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Fructan, Allantoin, Adenosine, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Xylitol, Salicylic Acid, Lactobionic Acid, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Pentylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Benzyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Ethyl Hexanediol, Raspberry Ketone, Phenoxyethanol, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil
a893fac0-7592-11ef-bb9f-0171f9d451d8.name: [ SOME BY MI ] AHA BHA PHA 30 Days Miracle Toner 150 ml

a8c37980-5675-11ef-8df4-ffbc15ce2a56.description:
This innovative double-sided pad has a gauze side to gently exfoliate the skin, buffing away dead skin cells for a smoother complexion. On the other hand, the plain cotton side effectively removes dirt and impurities while providing relief to sensitive skin.
Enriched with a potent Hyaluronic Acid Ampoule Essence, this pad saturates the skin with moisture, ensuring optimal hydration levels. The combination of 8 types of Hyaluronic Acid and Acetyl Glutamine works together to keep the skin moisturized and plump.
Panthenol and Sorbitol contribute to soothing and calming the skin, while PHA (Polyhydroxy Acid) effectively takes care of dead skin cells without causing irritation.
Additionally, Succinic acid proves to be highly effective in removing dead skin cells and excess sebum without causing any discomfort to the skin.
It is gentle and safe for daily use, featuring a hypoallergenic formula that won't irritate the skin. As an added convenience, the pad comes with a tweezer enclosed.
Suitable for all skin types but works especially well for those with dry, dehydrated or congested skin as well as fine lines and wrinkles.

c6ced940-5672-11ef-a96d-8bc2af26a673.description:
Say goodbye to stubborn impurities with Abib Acne Foam Cleanser Heartleaf Foam.

This foaming cleanser is your ultimate solution for a fresh, clear complexion. Crafted with a blend of potent ingredients, it effortlessly removes makeup and dirt, making it perfect for oily, acne-prone skin.

Infused with salicylic acid, it fights blackheads while heartleaf and centella extracts soothe and calm your skin. Wintergreen leaf extract lends its anti-inflammatory and antibacterial properties, reducing the appearance of acne for a smoother, clearer complexion. 

Experience the power of exfoliating heartleaf as it gently prevents outbreaks and leaves your skin feeling refreshed and revitalized. Bid farewell to excess sebum and redness with this multitasking K-beauty essential.

Size: 150ml
c6ced940-5672-11ef-a96d-8bc2af26a673.howToUse:
Use morning and night, after removing makeup. Begin with wet hands and face. Squeeze a proper amount onto your hand and foam up. Gently massage onto face avoiding the eye and mouth area. Rinse with warm water.

We recommend doing a patch test on a wrist or behind the ear before using any new product.

Water, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Glycerin, Houttuynia Cordata Extract(30,000ppm), Coco-Betaine, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Butylene Glycol, Gaultheria Procumbens (Wintergreen) Leaf Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Salicylic Acid, Sodium Chloride, Caprylyl Glycol, Polyquaternium-67, Tromethamine, Panthenol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA

d603f400-74e9-11ef-a341-6d7a9d27426c.description:
100% TOP-QUALITY MUGWORT FROM GANGHWA FROM S.KOREA - Extracted mugwort with the slow-release extraction method to maximize the nutrients in the concentrate. It contains 100% natural mugwort and its original effects as it is into the bottle.
CALLED TEA TREE IN KOREA - Mugworts are called 'tea tree' in Korea for its soothing and cleansing effect. Korean native herb Mugwort holds a unique scent of Chineol containing vitamins, minerals, and tannins.
CALM AND SOOTHE IRRITATED SKIN - Consisting of a main ingredient, Mugwort, the soft, thin and fluid texture quickly cleanses and detox sensitive skin. As a Korean natural herb, the mugwort has been widely known for treatments and detoxing effects. This is effective for treating troubled, irritated skin. Apply the essence to areas with concerns to see instant effects. Also may be used as a facial mist, Mugwort bath, and feminine mist.
STRONG ANTIOXIDANT - Korean mugwort is known for its unique scent and antioxidants, full of vitamins and minerals to restore youth and energy as well as for its amazing calming and detoxifying effects, making it excellent for skincare.
RECOMMENDED FOR TROUBLED, RED, AGITATED SKIN - such as after long sun-exposure, shaving, outdoor activities, and stressful days.
Animal Creulty-Free, Vegan Friendly, Silicon-free, Steroid-free, Artificial coloring, fragrance-free/ 160ml / All Skin Types / Made in Korea
d603f400-74e9-11ef-a341-6d7a9d27426c.howToUse:
After cleansing as toner step, add a few drops on your palm.
Gently pat over the face and neck to allow better absorption.
We recommend layering multiple times to increase hydration.
Can be used in both AM and PM routines.

e68c2a60-b317-11ef-82e6-8b50ec384e39.description:
Experience gentle and effective cleansing with the Calendula Complete Cleansing Oil. Formulated with a blend of nourishing oils including Sunflower Seed Oil, Canola Oil, and Jojoba Seed Oil, this cleansing oil effortlessly melts away makeup, impurities, and excess oil. Enriched with Calendula Flower Extract, it soothes and calms the skin, leaving it feeling refreshed and balanced.

This cleansing oil provides a luxurious and indulgent skincare experience. Embrace the power of nature with the Calendula Complete Cleansing Oil and unveil a clean, radiant complexion.

Recommended for: All skin types.
e68c2a60-b317-11ef-82e6-8b50ec384e39.howToUse:
Start with dry hands and a dry face.
Take a small amount of the Calendula Complete Cleansing Oil and gently massage it onto your face, including areas with makeup or impurities.
Add a few drops of water to emulsify the oil, creating a milky texture.
Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water, and pat your face dry with a clean towel..
e68c2a60-b317-11ef-82e6-8b50ec384e39.ingredients: Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Canola Oil, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Sorbeth-30 Tetraoleate, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Cananga Odorata Flower Oil, Sorbitan Sesquioleate
e68c2a60-b317-11ef-82e6-8b50ec384e39.name: Calendula Complete Cleansing Oil

e697fc20-b315-11ef-badb-af1be854a723.description:
The iUNIK Centella Calming Daily Sunscreen SPF 50+ PA++++ is a broad-spectrum sunscreen to shield skin against harmful UV rays. It contains centella asiatica extract to deliver soothing an effect to the skin. The lightweight, watery texture quickly absorbs and doesn't leave any white cast behind. 

Recommended for: Normal, Sensitive skin types.
e697fc20-b315-11ef-badb-af1be854a723.howToUse:
Use as the last step in skincare routine. Apply an appropriate amount to the skin. 
Apply evenly to skin exposed to UV rays, avoiding eye area.
Gently pat and blend the sunscreen into your skin until fully absorbed. Reapply every 2 hours for optimal sun protection throughout the day.
e697fc20-b315-11ef-badb-af1be854a723.ingredients: Centella Asiatica Extract(49%), Water, Dibutyl Adipate, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Methylene Bis-Benzotriazolyl Tetramethylbutylphenol, Polysilicone-15, 1,2-Hexanediol, Beta-Glucan, Allantoin, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Arachidyl Alcohol, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Behenyl Alcohol, Decyl Glucoside, Caprylyl Glycol, Arachidyl Glucoside, Hydroxyacetophenone, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Carbomer, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Adenosine, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Glucose, t-Butyl Alcohol, Xanthan Gum, Tromethamine, Disodium EDTA

This light and moisturizing gel cream can help to make sensitive skin blemish calming and relief with centella asiatica leaf water 70% and tea tree leaf water 10% from skin stress.
An effective ratio of 70% centella asiatica leaf water and 10% tea tree leaf water helps improve sensitive skin.
Triterpenoids found in centella asiatica makes skin clear and healthy.
Contains 6000ppm of sprout extracts in patented organic form of abundant moisture and nutrients.
Contains studied ingredients niacinamide and adenosine for brightening skin tone and wrinkle care.

POWERFUL FIG EXTRACT: Embrace the benefits of Fig Extract with a remarkable concentration of 62.7%. Experience its natural goodness for deep skin hydration and a moisturizing finish.
LIGHTWEIGHT HYDRATION: Enjoy a lightweight texture that swiftly absorbs, providing instant hydration to the skin. Say goodbye to heaviness and hello to a refreshing, moisturized feel.
SMOOTH SKIN PREP: Utilizing the power of BHA combined with Fig Extract, this essence works wonders by smoothing the skin and preparing it for the next steps in your skincare routine. Get ready for a flawless canvas.
MOISTURE BARRIER & ANTI-AGING: Enriched with NMF Peptide and Amino Acid, this essence doesn't just hydrate; it creates a moisture barrier for full hydration. Additionally, experience anti-aging antioxidant effects with Fig Extract and Polyphenol.
SKIN BOOST & ABSORPTION: Elevate your skincare routine with Fig Extract's skin-boosting properties. Enhance absorption for the next steps in your regimen, ensuring each product works to its fullest potential.
f9965410-74eb-11ef-8d94-39859d9f2d12.howToUse:
Directions
1. Apply a suitable amount of essence to cleansed skin. 2. Gently pat and smooth the essence over the face and neck until fully absorbed. 3. Follow with the rest of your skincare routine.
